message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $110?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not comfortable going as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $105. What do you think?
I'm not sure I'm willing to go up to $105. I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you meet me in the middle again?
I can see you're a savvy negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a good price for the product. I'll meet you at $98. What do you think?
